name: Project Rounds
description:
Play as Sir the Brave, a knight who may have lied on his application resume, as he embarks on an adventure to stop the king of slimes and the ongoing slime invasion!

Project Rounds is a dodging game inspired by 101 Rounds, a custom map for Warcraft 3. You will take control of Sir the Brave, a not so brave knight, and complete levels by dodging slimes and... not die. 

This is a demo and after round 10 it will become tough to survive, also you cannot revive once you reach level 11. We hope you enjoy and any feedback in the comments is appreciated!

Plans for full release:

  • In the demo you will only experience the city theme, however, in the full release we intend to add multiple themes to travel through.
  • The boss mechanics will be influenced by the current theme.
  • Specific slime types will be added when reaching their corresponding theme (In the demo you have the pleasure of meeting all kinds of slime, regardless of theme).
  • Infinite revival will be removed.
  • Speedrun mode.

Credits:

The sprite for Sir the Brave was inspired by the 16x16 Dungeon Tileset by 0x72

Music used in the demo: 8-bit Fantasy Adventure by xDeviruchi

Font used in the demo: Humble Fonts by somepx
